thread.title: 21 Adult References You Never Noticed In ‘90s Batman Cartoons
thread.title_full: 21 Adult References You Never Noticed In ‘90s Batman Cartoons

author: Christopher Hudspeth
title: 21 Adult References You Never Noticed In ‘90s Batman Cartoons
text:
View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10592891 2. The time tax season had the Joker shook. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10588214 3. When Roxy Rocket and Batman were about to crash into a cliff but it looked/felt/sounded very sexual. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10587059 4. The time Harley surfaced from a giant pie (butt first) and sang to the Joker in a sexy, Marilyn Monroe cadence. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10579204 5. When Harley tried to get some action from the Joker. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10579509 6. When the Joker was auditioning new Harley Quinn candidates and this one shoved his face into her chest. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10588112 7. When The Creeper aggressively chased Harley, then made this slick comment after she tried to hit him… View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10579245 8. He was really persistent… View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10579303 9. Then eventually Batman knocked The Creeper out and his face landed right in Harley’s bosom. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10579358 10. When Batman searched for the Joker in a strip club… View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10579689 11. …And this goon had a guess about what the Joker might be up to. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10579666 12. The time Killer Croc and Baby Doll teamed up to commit crime, but Batgirl wondered what the two of them do in private. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10587235 13. When some random dudes hit on Harley Quinn and Poison Ivy at a stoplight and asked if they were going to spank them. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10587469 14. That time there was a suggestive sound heard when the Riddler was approached by an attractive woman… View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10587906 15. And shortly after, another woman seductively asked the Riddler how a pair of ball-shaped walkie talkies work. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10587885 16. This questionably placed question mark on the Riddler’s gal’s leotard. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10588150 17. That time Harley Quinn took a shot at Detective Bullock size. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10588300 18. That time Bruce Wayne insinuated he was going to bang Karl Rossum’s assistant and gave Lucius a smirk when she walked into the room. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10592402 19. That time Zatanna questioned Batman’s motives for helping her. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Television Distribution ID: 10592767 20. When Dick and Cindy’s study session was about to get frisky. View this image ›
ID: 10593082 21. And finally, the time Catwoman took Batman’s assessment of her temperature as a compliment. View this image ›
